title: Wayward Beta 2.4.4
description: Wayward is a turn-based, top-down, wilderness survival roguelike.In Wayward, there is a large focus on simulation, survival and openness. There are no classes; there are no levels. Progression of your character depends on individual skill and stat gains by your interactions with items or objects in the world. You are free to play and explore the game in any fashion you wish.Wayward will continue to grow, expand, and evolve over time to open up new modes of play, add depth and complexity, add
